name: Crossroad Mysteries: The Broken Deal
description: Anna goes to the places of her childhood. She hopes to get cured from strange disease. This is the last chance to find out the cause of her misery. Whether she ever recover and at what price?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 3400 Series, GeForce 205 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible Sound
